<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>I chose a random trivia API that outputs random facts.</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
    {% raw %}
    
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">

<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">requests</span>

<span class="n">url</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">&quot;https://numbersapi.p.rapidapi.com/random/trivia&quot;</span>

<span class="n">querystring</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span><span class="s2">&quot;min&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s2">&quot;10&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">&quot;max&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s2">&quot;20&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">&quot;fragment&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s2">&quot;true&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s2">&quot;json&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s2">&quot;true&quot;</span><span class="p">}</span>

<span class="n">headers</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span>
	<span class="s2">&quot;X-RapidAPI-Key&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s2">&quot;217acfa59emsh9a56b5c7ec9c672p11520bjsnbe23d137f1c8&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
	<span class="s2">&quot;X-RapidAPI-Host&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s2">&quot;numbersapi.p.rapidapi.com&quot;</span>
<span class="p">}</span>

<span class="n">response</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">requests</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">request</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;GET&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">url</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">headers</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">headers</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">params</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">querystring</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">response</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">text</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output">

<div class="output_area">

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>I did coin flip API, here which flips a coin and outputs whether is head or tails.</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
    {% raw %}
    
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">

<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">requests</span>

<span class="n">url</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">&quot;https://coin-flip1.p.rapidapi.com/headstails&quot;</span>

<span class="n">headers</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span>
	<span class="s2">&quot;X-RapidAPI-Key&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s2">&quot;217acfa59emsh9a56b5c7ec9c672p11520bjsnbe23d137f1c8&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span>
	<span class="s2">&quot;X-RapidAPI-Host&quot;</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s2">&quot;coin-flip1.p.rapidapi.com&quot;</span>
<span class="p">}</span>

<span class="n">response</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">requests</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">request</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&quot;GET&quot;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">url</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">headers</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">headers</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">response</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">text</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">

<div class="output_area">

<div class="output_subarea output_stream output_stdout output_text">
<pre>{&#34;outcome&#34;: &#34;Heads&#34;}
</pre>
</div>
</div>
